mapper.select: SELECT attribute.* from attribute, productdetail WHERE productid = #{0} and componentID = #{1} and productdetailID = referenceID and referencetable = 'PRODUCTDETAIL'
SELECT attribute.* from attribute, barcodedetail WHERE componentID = #{componentID} and productdetailID = referenceID and referencetable = 'BARCODEDETAIL'
mapper.insert: insert into attribute (Referencetable, referenceid, attributeName, attributevalue) values (#{referenceTable}, #{referenceID}, #{attributeName}, #{attributeValue})
